languages.text: "Но, чтобы нити шансов позволили нам встретиться, а тебе исполнить свое предназначение, ты долж{mf|ен|на} взять с собой осколки клинка, что сплели наши судьбы. До встречи, Дитя Рассвета, я буду ждать". {n}Голос вновь пропадает, растворяясь в эхе чужих мыслей.{/n}

"But in order for the threads of chance to allow us to meet and for you to fulfil your purpose, you must bring along the blade shards that wove our destinies together. Goodbye, Child of the Dawn. I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Но, чтобы нити шансов позволили нам встретиться, а тебе исполнить свое предназначение, ты долж{mf|ен|на} взять с собой осколки клинка, что сплели наши судьбы. До встречи, Дитя Рассвета, я буду ждать". {n}Голос вновь пропадает, растворяясь в эхе чужих мыслей.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "But in order for the threads of chance to allow us to meet and for you to fulfil your purpose, you must bring along the blade shards that wove our destinies together. Goodbye, Child of the Dawn. I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

"But in order for the threads of chance to allow us to meet and for you to fulfil your purpose, you must bring along the blade shards that wove our destinies together. Goodbye, Child of the Dawn. I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

languages.text: “不过，为了让我们再次有机会见面，为了让你实现你的目标，你必须带上那块刀刃碎片，它会将我们的命运编织在一起。再见了，黎明之子，我会等着你的。”{n}那个声音再次消失了，融入其他人思想的回声之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But in order for the threads of chance to allow us to meet and for you to fulfil your purpose, you must bring along the blade shards that wove our destinies together. Goodbye, Child of the Dawn. I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不过，为了让我们再次有机会见面，为了让你实现你的目标，你必须带上那块刀刃碎片，它会将我们的命运编织在一起。再见了，黎明之子，我会等着你的。”{n}那个声音再次消失了，融入其他人思想的回声之中。{/n}

languages.text: "Doch damit die Fäden des Schicksals uns gestatten, dass wir uns begegnen und dass Ihr Euren Zweck erfüllen könnt, müsst Ihr die Klingensplitter mitnehmen, die unsere Bestimmungen miteinander verwoben haben. Lebt wohl, Kind der Dämmerung. Ich werde auf Euch warten." {n}Die Stimme verschwindet wieder, löst sich in den Echos der Gedanken anderer Leute auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But in order for the threads of chance to allow us to meet and for you to fulfil your purpose, you must bring along the blade shards that wove our destinies together. Goodbye, Child of the Dawn. I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Doch damit die Fäden des Schicksals uns gestatten, dass wir uns begegnen und dass Ihr Euren Zweck erfüllen könnt, müsst Ihr die Klingensplitter mitnehmen, die unsere Bestimmungen miteinander verwoben haben. Lebt wohl, Kind der Dämmerung. Ich werde auf Euch warten." {n}Die Stimme verschwindet wieder, löst sich in den Echos der Gedanken anderer Leute auf.{/n}

languages.text: «Pero para que los hilos del azar permitan que nos encontremos y puedas así cumplir tu propósito, debes traerme los fragmentos de la hoja que entrelazó nuestros destinos. Adiós, Vástago del Amanecer. Te estaré esperando». {n}La voz desaparece una vez más, disuelta en los ecos de pensamientos ajenos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But in order for the threads of chance to allow us to meet and for you to fulfil your purpose, you must bring along the blade shards that wove our destinies together. Goodbye, Child of the Dawn. I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Pero para que los hilos del azar permitan que nos encontremos y puedas así cumplir tu propósito, debes traerme los fragmentos de la hoja que entrelazó nuestros destinos. Adiós, Vástago del Amanecer. Te estaré esperando». {n}La voz desaparece una vez más, disuelta en los ecos de pensamientos ajenos.{/n}

languages.text: « Mais pour que la trame de la fortune nous rassemble et vous laisse remplir votre but, vous devez apporter les fragments de lame qui ont uni nos destinées. Au revoir, enfant de l'Aube. Je vous attends. » {n}La voix disparaît de nouveau, comme dissoute dans les échos laissés par les pensées d'autres personnes.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But in order for the threads of chance to allow us to meet and for you to fulfil your purpose, you must bring along the blade shards that wove our destinies together. Goodbye, Child of the Dawn. I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais pour que la trame de la fortune nous rassemble et vous laisse remplir votre but, vous devez apporter les fragments de lame qui ont uni nos destinées. Au revoir, enfant de l'Aube. Je vous attends. » {n}La voix disparaît de nouveau, comme dissoute dans les échos laissés par les pensées d'autres personnes.{/n}

languages.text: 「でも、偶然の糸が私たちを出会わせ、あなたが目的を果たすためには、私たちの運命を紡いだ刃の欠片も一緒に持っていかなくてはならない。さようなら、暁の子よ。私はあなたを待っているわ」{n}声は再び消え、他の人々の思考の反響の中に溶けていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "But in order for the threads of chance to allow us to meet and for you to fulfil your purpose, you must bring along the blade shards that wove our destinies together. Goodbye, Child of the Dawn. I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「でも、偶然の糸が私たちを出会わせ、あなたが目的を果たすためには、私たちの運命を紡いだ刃の欠片も一緒に持っていかなくてはならない。さようなら、暁の子よ。私はあなたを待っているわ」{n}声は再び消え、他の人々の思考の反響の中に溶けていった。{/n}

languages.text: "Ancak olasılığın iplerinin buluşmamıza ve amacını gerçekleştirmene izin vermesi için kaderlerimizi birbirine bağlayan bıçak kırıklarını da beraberinde getirmelisin. Elveda Şafak Evladı, seni bekliyor olacağım." {n}Diğer şahısların düşüncelerinin yankısına karışan ses, bir kez daha kayboluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "But in order for the threads of chance to allow us to meet and for you to fulfil your purpose, you must bring along the blade shards that wove our destinies together. Goodbye, Child of the Dawn. I will be waiting for you." {n}The voice is gone again, dissolved in the echoes of other people's thoughts.{/n}
